I2C Bus Scan with RPi pico

dev board RaspberryPI Pico
firmware C
firmware C++
chip RP2040
chip Si7021
chip VCNL4000

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Pico toolchain

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky Pico

Buy the components

  1. Raspberry PI Pico

Code

Download code pico-i2c.c

Prototype

A photo of the actual setup.

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Serial console

Serial output from the firmware.

Description

This example code does an I2C Bus Scan for the sensors Si7021 and VCNL4000.

The datasheets of the 2 sensors below show that the serial monitor prints are in line with the information in the datasheet.

The I2C address for Si7021 is 0x40.

The I2C address for VCNL4000 is 0x13.

References

  1. Pico I2C Bus Scan example code
  2. Adafruit Si7021 Temperature / Humidity sensor Dev Board
  3. Si70721 Temperature / Humidity datasheet
  4. Adafruit VCNL4000 proximity sensor dev board
  5. VCNL4000 datasheet
